project.name: TrnExmProject-impl

target.name: deploy
target.echo: IMPORTANT: You may need to "Start Local Server" if it is not already running

target.name: quick-deploy-web
target.description: Deploys classes, static files into an already deployed fndweb.ear

fail.message: Please perform a complete 'Deploy' once, before using 'Quick Deploy'

target.name: deploy-check
target.fail: Server instance not set, try closing and reopening your project

target.name: init-web-components
copy-web-component-specific-files
target.echo: Copying static files (images, js etc.) for web component ${web.component.name}
Copying config files and libraries for web component ${web.component.name}

target.name: init-check
target.fail: The Application Server is empty, there is nothing to deploy!

fail.message: Please perform a complete 'Deploy' once, before trying to start Connect or Batch Server'

echo.message: * First add framework POJO jars to the 'lib' subdirectory
* Copy libraries needed for Batch and Connect servers
* Copy ejbs required for server tester
* Copy ejbs required for bizapi development and testing
* Copy ejbs for missing models/source as fallback
* Copy all third party jars to the lib subdirectory
Creating ifs-fnd-resources.jar containing application-config.xml for apps 9

target.name: pack-ws-war
target.concat: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE jboss-web PUBLIC "-//JBoss//DTD Web Application 2.3V2//EN" "http://www.jboss.org/j2ee/dtd/jboss-web_3_2.dtd"> <jboss-web> <security-domain flushOnSessionInvalidation="true">java:/jaas/IFSApplications</security-domain> </jboss-web>

echo.message: Installing ${jar.file.name} in local maven repo as group ${group.id} artifact ${artifact.id} version ${jar.version}
